wallet.Safely store: Safely store and transfer your crypto and NFTs.
wallet.Log In to Any: Log In to Any NEAR App
wallet.No need to create: No need to create new accounts or credentials. Connect your wallet and you are good to go!
wallet.Use a wallet: Use a wallet to secure and manage your NEAR assets, and to log in to any NEAR app without the need for usernames and passwords.

ledger.Make sure your Ledger: Make sure your Ledger is connected securely, and that the NEAR app is open on your device.
ledger.Enter your preferred HD path: Enter your preferred HD path, then scan for any active accounts.
ledger.Access denied to use Ledger device: Access denied to use Ledger device
ledger.Can't find any account: Can't find any account associated with this Ledger. Please createa new NEAR account on
ledger.Failed to automatically: Failed to automatically find account id. Provide it manually:
ledger.Overview the list of authorized: Overview the list of authorized account(s), complete sign in by clicking the button below.
